event.title: Located in Southern Illinois, the population was 4,442 at the 2010

data.event: Located in Southern Illinois, the population was 4,442 at the 2010 United States Census, a decline from 5,135 in 2000.
The city was incorporated on February 16, 1865.

event.title: 1909, a mob of angry white citizens drove out

data.event: In 1909, a mob of angry white citizens drove out Anna's black families following the lynching in a nearby town of a black man accused of raping a white woman.

event.title: is located at 37°27′40″N 89°14′20″W. According to the 2010

data.event: Anna is located at 37°27′40″N 89°14′20″W. According to the 2010 census, Anna has a total area of 3.519 square miles (9.11 km2), of which 3.5 square miles (9.06 km2) (or 99.46%) is land and 0.019 square miles (0.05 km2) (or 0.54%) is water.
